name: Ext_R5_DeviceUsage_status
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.DeviceUsage.status for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents DeviceUsage.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DeviceUsage|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: A code representing the patient or other source's judgment about the state of the device used that this statement is about.  Generally this will be active or completed.
element.comment: `DeviceUsage.status` maps to R4B `DeviceUseStatement.status`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
element.isModifierReason: This element is labelled as a modifier because it is a status element that contains status entered-in-error which means that the resource should not be treated as valid

element.definition: A code representing the patient or other source's judgment about the state of the device used that this statement is about.  Generally this will be active or completed.
element.comment: `DeviceUsage.status` maps to R4B `DeviceUseStatement.status`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: A coded concept indicating the current status of the Device Usage.
